name: Naughty Spirits
description:
In a charming forest a strange house has appeared, causing curiosity for certain spirits and for others caution.

Naughty Spirits is a Mobile multiplayer game with VR support.

You can play as Dahlia, the guardian of the forest, your mission will be to catch or prevent curious spirits from making noise before they awaken the humans and keep the secret of the forest safe. Or play as one of these mischievous spirits, using your magic to animate objects and make noises, you will have to be agile to avoid being caught by Dahlia.
